How to Unlock the Gray Wolf Card!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): FAQ: How to Unlock the Gray Wolf Card!
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, January 21, 2004 - 08:49 pm:

With the aid of the Japanese strategy guide, I have solved the mystery of the Gray Wolf card that people were unlocking with gamesharks.

How to unlock "Gray Wolf"


Go in and out of the Laboratory 50 times and shrine at least one CD/game each time. You don't have to do this in one sitting. I started with a save where I had been into the Laboratory a few times, then went in & out 30 times, saved, came back and tested a few more CDs and got a small bit of dialog thanking me, then was given the Gray Wolf Card.

*Difficulty does not matter. I tested this at Easy and Hard.

*Progress in the game does not seem to matter, I tested this on a save where I had saved as soon as possible, and one further into the game.

*Testing tons of CDs all at once in one session won't do it. You MUST go in and out of the Lab to trigger the event. (I suspect that this is why we never saw it before. I used to shrine hundreds of CDs in a single session, then not save.)

*Saving doesn't affect things one way or the other.
